fx_0002.name: a statue of Napoleon in the centre

looks: It's a life-sized, white marble staute of the celebrated French Emperor Napoleon. He sports a smug expression of indifferent superiority. Perhaps he knows how expensive the statue is.

fx_0007.name: a bay window on the northern wall

looks: It is a lovely bay window with yellow sunlight streaming in.

It's a floor to ceiling mirror fixed to the wall. It needs some windex, newspaper, and elbow grease. There's a curious person looking into it--not dashingly handsome, but fair. Oh, it's you! Now you're blushing.
